title: Misrepresented Penix comment draws coach's ire
content: A viral clip of quarterback Michael Penix Jr. led to incorrect assumptions about the support system he has within the Falcons, coach Raheem Morris says.

title: Jets' Glenn 'evaluating everything,' including QB1
content: Jets coach Aaron Glenn, often defiant when questioned about his quarterback situation, took a different approach Friday. In a sober tone, he sounded open to a quarterback change.

title: Devils' Hughes suffers 'freak' non-hockey injury
content: Devils star Jack Hughes is being evaluated for a non-hockey injury on his hand, the team announced on Friday.

title: Thomas has back surgery, to miss PGA Tour start
content: Two-time major winner Justin Thomas announced Friday that he will miss the beginning of the 2026 PGA Tour season after undergoing back surgery.

title: 'Last Chance U' coach Beam dies after being shot
content: College football coach John Beam, who was featured in the Netflix series "Last Chance U," has died after being shot, the Oakland Police Department said Friday.

title: Duke lands latest top-five prospect in Williams
content: Top-five prospect Cameron Williams has committed to Duke over Arizona and Texas, giving the Blue Devils the highest-ranked commit in the 2026 class.

title: AD: USC wants long-term benefits of equity deal
content: USC athletic director Jen Cohen addressed the school's stance on the pending Big Ten private capital deal Friday, saying University leadership is focused on the long-term benefits.

title: Poch: No USMNT player 'safe' in making WC roster
content: USMNT coach Mauricio Pochettino reiterated his stance that "no one can feel safe" when it comes to making the World Cup roster.

title: 14 more NFL Week 11 games, 14 matchup previews: We have predictions, picks and wild stats
content: Football in Spain? Baker Mayfield vs. Josh Allen? Picks, predictions and stats for every Week 11 game.

title: 'We want AJ!': What sold Dybantsa on BYU over basketball's blue bloods
content: Advice from Kevin Durant. A program modeled after an NBA team. Here's how the No. 1 recruit landed in Provo.

title: Looking for the next Cignetti? Start with these traits and coaches
content: If any of the nine open Power 4 jobs want to replicate Indiana's success, here are the steps they could take.

title: Real or not real: Another perfect UConn season? UCLA's best team ever?
content: Can Azzi Fudd & Co. run the table? Is this Dawn Staley's best South Carolina backcourt? Let's debate.

title: Will Tigers trade Skubal? What we learned about all 30 teams at the MLB GM meetings
content: From Tarik Skubal's status to the future of the Phillies' core, here are the top offseason priorities straight from every front office.

title: MLB Awards Week results: Aaron Judge, Shohei Ohtani win second consecutive MVPs
content: Baseball's best collected their hardware this week. We have everything to know about all the winners.

title: NHL Power Rankings: 1-32 poll, one fantasy add for each team
content: Another week in, and the Avalanche remain at No. 1. Plus, get your fantasy team on track with a pickup for all 32.

title: Who would win the 2026 World Cup if it kicked off today?
content: We're seven months from the start of the 2026 World Cup. While qualification wraps up, our writers answer a simple question: Who's winning it right now?

title: VAR Review: Why was Ronaldo sent off for Portugal?
content: Cristiano Ronaldo was shown a red card against the Republic of Ireland after appearing to elbow Dara O'Shea.

title: The key to Zilisch becoming NASCAR's next big star
content: The NASCAR Cup Series isn't kind to rookies, no matter how highly touted, but that may not apply to Connor Zilisch when he steps up in 2026.

title: Lions to consult Eminem for Thanksgiving halftime show advice
content: The hip-hop icon will be advising his hometown team on talent selection and halftime production of the show.

title: Risers and fallers: Jalen Johnson on his way to superstar status
content: Steve Alexander highlights fantasy basketball names trending upwards or downwards, with key takeaways for each.

title: How Roldan went from USMNT afterthought to Pochettino favorite
content: A few months ago, Cristian Roldan believed his USMNT career was drifting away. Now he could be in line for a key role under Mauricio Pochettino.

title: Ranked: Europe's 10 worst transfers from this summer -- and the 5 best
content: After three months, we rank the 10 worst transfers and the 5 best from the summer of 2025 in the Premier League, LaLiga and the rest of Europe.

title: Trump Lifts Tariffs On Beef, Coffee, Tropical Fruits
content: President Donald Trump signed an executive order Friday to get rid of tariffs on a broad swath of commodities, including beef, coffee and tropical fruits. It's part of a response to pressure from consumers who complain prices are too high.

title: J&K Administration Orders Suspension Of Senior Cop For 'Slapping' Officer
content: The Jammu and Kashmir administration on Friday ordered the suspension of Deputy Superintendent of Police (DSP) for allegedly assaulting an administrative officer on duty.

title: 7 Killed, 27 Injured After Explosives Go Off At J&K Police Station
content: Several bodies were pulled out of debris after a huge pile of confiscated explosives stored at a police station went off in Jammu and Kashmir's Srinagar on Friday night.

title: Trump Demands Probe Into Epstein Links To Bill Clinton
content: US President Donald Trump told law enforcement chiefs Friday to investigate links between Jeffrey Epstein and ex-president Bill Clinton, as he sought to deflect growing questions about his own ties to the late alleged sex trafficker.

title: Day After Delhi Blast, Hate Graffiti Seen At Top Institute In Kolkata
content: A controversy broke out at a premier institute in Kolkata earlier this week over a communal graffiti. A day after the suicide bomb attack near Delhi's Red Fort, some hate graffiti were seen at the Indian Statistical Institute.

title: Trump Likely To Sell F-35 Fighter Jets To Saudi Arabia: Report
content: US President Donald Trump is expected to reach a deal with Saudi Crown Prince Mohammed bin Salman allowing Riyadh to acquire F-35 stealth fighter jets, Bloomberg News reported on Friday, citing a White House official.

title: Mayawati's Party Candidate Wins Ramgarh Seat In Bihar By 30 Votes
content: Mayawati's Bahujan Samaj Party has won one seat in Bihar. Its candidate Satish Kumar Yadav has won, beating his nearest rival, the BJP's sitting legislator Ashok Kumar Singh, by 30 votes.

title: These Bihar Ministers Became MLAs In 1990, Now Headed To 9th Straight Win
content: They became MLAs in 1990, when Tejashwi Yadav was three months old. Since then, they have won every election in Bihar from the same seats. BJP's Prem Kumar and JDU's Bijendra Prasad Yadav are now set for ninth straight win from Gaya Town and Supaul

title: Will Chirag Paswan Be Nitish Kumar's Deputy In Bihar? Here's What He Said
content: Chirag Paswan, the son of late Bihar leader Ram Vilas Paswan, has come of age in the just concluded assembly election, leaving a huge footprint on the state and the alliance. His Lok Jan Shakti Party (Ram Vilas) won 19 seats.

title: NDA Overdelivers In Bihar, Tejashwi & Co Crash Land. PM's Next Target - Bengal
content: The NDA has retained power in Bihar with a landslide win, crafted by its caste math and an unexpected wave of support for Chief Minister Nitish Kumar. It left the Opposition decimated, with Tejashwi Yadav's RJD getting less than half its 2020 seats.

title: 'Democrats Doing Everything To Push Epstein Hoax Again': Donald Trump
content: US President Donald Trump claimed Friday that pressure to release details of Jeffrey Epstein's alleged sex abuse network is a "hoax" pushed by Democratic opponents.

title: Chinese Man Dubbed 'Most Prolific Sex Offender' Jailed For Life In UK
content: A Chinese national dubbed "one of the most prolific sex offenders of all time" by British police was sentenced to life in prison on Friday.

title: Hasina's Awami Doubles Down On Its Attack On Yunus, Announces More Protests
content: The Sheikh Hasina-led Bangladesh Awami League has upped the ante against the Muhammad Yunus regime that currently governs Bangladesh. The party has now announced more protests to take on Muhammad Yunus.

title: Assembly Bypolls Result Highlights: Congress, BJP, PDP Register Key Victories In Assembly Bypolls
content: The counting of votes for the recent Assembly by-elections reveals a mixed outcome, with both the Bharatiya Janata Party (BJP) and the Congress marking notable victories and leads.

title: White House Says Alibaba Is Helping Chinese Military Target US: Report
content: Washington is accusing online marketplace company Alibaba of providing technological support for Chinese military "operations" against targets in the United States, a report revealed on Friday, citing a White House national security memo.

title: Bihar Results: The Biggest Winners And Losers
content: The National Democratic Alliance (NDA) has secured one of its strongest mandates in two decades in the Bihar Assembly elections.

title: "Giving Rs 10,000 To Women During Polls...": Mukesh Sahani On Bihar Loss
content: A clip of Mukesh Sahani jumping into a pond, along with Rahul Gandhi, during campaigning in Bihar's Begusarai was a big hit on the internet. In internet speak, it was viral.

title: Bihar Results Live: From Single Largest Party To 2nd Worst Performance: RJD's Big Bihar Rout
content: As votes cast in the high-voltage Bihar election have been counted now, the main opposition RJD's score is a sorry sight.

title: "Political Suicide": Omar Abdullah Blames Party MP After Budgam Bypoll Loss
content: After the Jammu and Kashmir's National Conference party faced a major setback in the Budgam bye-elections on Friday, it was only the party's estranged MP Aga Syed Ruhullah Mehdi who celebrated his victory over Chief Minister Omar Abdullah

title: PK Guided Many Leaders To Poll Wins. His Party Fails To Open Bihar Account
content: Prashant Kishor guided many a leader to electoral victory, but faced a massive defeat in his first poll test. His Jan Suraaj Party has scored a zero in this election

title: Bihar for NDA, big haar for MGB: Nitish does it again; alliance returns with crushing 202 seats
content: The National Democratic Alliance (NDA) secured a stunning landslide victory in Bihar, winning 202 out of 243 assembly seats. This outcome highlights Chief Minister Nitish Kumar's political resilience and Prime Minister Narendra Modi's influence, while also marking a significant moment for women voters and a strategic shift in coalition building.

title: J&K: 6 killed in blast at police station; team was handling explosive samples
content: An accidental blast at Srinagar's Nowgam police station killed 6 and injured 27 personnel late Friday night while they were extracting samples from a large cache of explosives. The material, part of a 'white-collar' terror module case, was seized from a rented residence in Faridabad, Haryana. The module was uncovered after threatening posters targeting security forces.

title: IPL: Shastri reveals truth behind Jadeja’s CSK exit - claims 'he always knew'
content: Ravindra Jadeja is set for a major IPL transfer. He is expected to join Rajasthan Royals from Chennai Super Kings. This move marks the end of a long association with CSK. Jadeja has navigated captaincy changes and crowd reactions. Former coach Ravi Shastri believes external noise will not affect his focus. Jadeja remains a top-class cricketer with proven performances.

title: GM to suppliers: Find alternatives to China; America’s largest carmaker sets deadline
content: General Motors is directing thousands of suppliers to remove China-sourced parts and raw materials from their supply chains, aiming for complete divestment by 2027. This move, intensified by deepening U.S.-China trade hostilities and President Trump's policies, seeks to enhance supply chain resiliency. Carmakers are accelerating efforts to unwind decades-old sourcing ties due to ongoing geopolitical and economic wrangling.

title: 'No discussion at... ': SA coach reacts to Bumrah's controversial 'bauna' remark
content: South Africa will not pursue the stump-mic incident from the first Test, with batting coach Ashwell Prince dismissing it as a non-issue. The remark, overheard during an appeal involving Temba Bavuma, sparked online debate.  Jasprit Bumrah's exceptional bowling, taking 5/27, dominated the day, reducing South Africa to 159 all out. India ended at 37/1, setting up a compelling second day.

title: Errol Musk warns of US ‘doom’; fears white minority shift; sparks debate
content: Errol Musk, father of Elon Musk, expressed concern that the U.S. will be 'doomed' if white people become a minority population within the next 20 years. He drew parallels to South Africa, claiming his community provided for Black people, a statement challenged by the interviewer regarding oppression.

title: Microsoft pricing shift: Nadella cites AI impact; software model to adapt
content: Microsoft is shifting its software pricing from a per-user model to a per-agent model as AI systems increasingly perform autonomous tasks. CEO Satya Nadella explained that the company is transitioning to an infrastructure provider, with existing services like Microsoft 365 becoming the core workspace for these AI agents.

title: NHL injury: Canadiens lose Alex Newhook long-term, Kaiden Guhle also out
content: Montreal Canadiens face a significant challenge as key players Alex Newhook and Kaiden Guhle are sidelined with long-term injuries. Newhook requires ankle surgery, expected to miss four months, while Guhle needs an abductor muscle repair, out for 8-10 weeks. The team is now evaluating AHL call-ups to fill the void and maintain competitiveness.

title: Was WhistlinDiesel arrested? Reported tax-evasion leak sparks online buzz
content: Popular YouTuber Cody Shane Detwiler, also known as WhistlinDiesel, faced arrest on November 13, 2025. Reports indicate tax evasion charges in Williamson County, Tennessee. A substantial bond was set. Detwiler himself confirmed the arrest via social media. This news has sparked widespread online discussion among his followers and the wider internet community.

title: Is Giannis Antetokounmpo playing tonight vs Hornets? Latest Bucks injury update
content: Giannis Antetokounmpo is probable to play tonight against the Charlotte Hornets after resting the previous game due to left knee patellar tendinopathy. The persistent condition requires careful load management, but his recent dominant performance highlights his continued impact. His return is crucial for the Bucks, who are also dealing with other roster injuries.

title: Gabrielle Union shares emotional birthday tribute for sister Tracy
content: Gabrielle Union recently celebrated her sister Tracy's birthday with a touching Instagram post featuring cherished childhood photos. The heartwarming tribute, which also saw tributes from Dwyane Wade and daughter Kaavia James, has captivated fans. This follows Union's equally emotional birthday message for Kaavia, highlighting the actress's deep family connections.

title: Heart health: The number one food to prevent arterial plaque buildup
content: High blood pressure stands out as one of the known markers behind heart damage and disease. Clinical research has revealed that sipping beetroot juice can trigger a dip in blood pressure within a few hours, marking it as a surprisingly effective natural option, for managing hypertension. The underlying mechanism lies in nitrates, which boost nitric oxide production, prompting vessels to relax and reducing resistance

title: Brittany Mahomes shares devastating news as Patrick stays focused
content: Patrick Mahomes and his wife Brittany are focused on the upcoming game against the Denver Broncos. Amidst this, Brittany shared a devastating tragedy affecting their friends, urging support for a GoFundMe to help a family who lost their home to a fire. Patrick also addressed the importance of the crucial divisional game.

title: Bihar election results: Rahul walked 1,300 km but Congress still went downhill
content: Rahul Gandhi's extensive 'Voter Adhikar Yatra' in Bihar, despite cultural outreach, failed to translate into votes for Congress. While his national yatras boosted his image, symbolic politics and organizational weaknesses hampered electoral success, particularly in the Hindi heartland, contrasting with victories in southern states.

title: Is LaMelo Ball playing tonight vs Bucks? Latest Hornets injury update
content: Charlotte Hornets' star LaMelo Ball is probable for tonight's game against the Milwaukee Bucks after a five-game absence due to an ankle injury. His return is crucial for the struggling Hornets, who have lacked offensive rhythm and consistency without their primary playmaker. Ball's presence aims to reignite the team's early-season momentum against a formidable opponent.

title: Bihar election results: How BJP flipped the script after 2024 Lok Sabha setback
content: Following a surprising 2024 Lok Sabha setback, the BJP has demonstrated a remarkable electoral resurgence.  Winning key state elections in Haryana, Maharashtra, Delhi, and Bihar, the party has effectively countered the narrative of diminished 'Modi-magic'.  This rebound is attributed to renewed organizational strength, strategic social engineering, and addressing local grievances, positioning 2024 as a mere aberration.

title: How was the first full-colour photograph of Earth captured by NASA
content: NASA's 1967 ATS-3 satellite captured Earth's first true-colour image, revolutionizing weather forecasting and planetary understanding. This breakthrough, using a novel scanning camera, allowed scientists to distinguish cloud layers and storm patterns with unprecedented clarity. The vivid global portrait fostered environmental awareness, bridging science and public consciousness, and laid the foundation for modern satellite imaging.

title: 'I will not answer': Bumrah shuts down workload management talk with blunt answer
content: Jasprit Bumrah, after a stellar 5-wicket haul, firmly shut down workload discussions, stating his focus is on giving his best and managing his body.  He emphasized patience and discipline on a challenging Eden Gardens pitch, where he was the standout performer. Bumrah's commitment to contributing across formats remains unwavering despite a demanding schedule.

title: Bihar results: Tejashwi survives Raghopur, Anant Singh wins from jail — surprise wins & losses
content: Bihar elections saw a decisive NDA victory, extending Nitish Kumar's rule. While Tejashwi Yadav retained his seat, it was a tougher fight than expected. JD(U)'s Anant Singh proved his stronghold, and BJP's Maithili Thakur made a successful debut. Notable defeats included Bhojpuri star Khesari Lal Yadav and Tej Pratap Yadav.

title: Bihar polls: Mandate that re-coloured Magadh — a tale of two maps dipped in different hues
content: Bihar's election results stunned pollsters as Nitish Kumar's NDA secured a decisive victory, humbling the opposition.  The mandate underscored the power of disciplined coalitions, targeted welfare, and strategic caste alliances.  Nitish Kumar's enduring appeal, particularly among women voters, and the NDA's cohesive social arithmetic proved overwhelming for a fragmented Mahagathbandhan.

title: Bihar election results: Prashant Kishor's Jan Suraaj finds itself 'farsh par' - decoding the dud
content: Prashant Kishor's ambitious Jan Suraaj party faced a significant setback in the Bihar elections. Despite meticulous planning and a nationwide padyatra, the party struggled to connect with voters on the ground. A lack of local leadership and candidate recognition proved to be major hurdles. The party's focus on professional credentials over local roots also impacted its performance.

title: Carnage! 15 sixes - Vaibhav unleashes mayhem on UAE in Rising Stars Asia Cup
content: Vaibhav Suryavanshi walked in with quiet intent but unleashed chaos within minutes. Every over seemed to bring a new flurry of sixes as he targeted every bowler with ruthless precision. His 42-ball 144, packed with 11 fours and 15 towering sixes, came at a scarcely believable strike rate of 342.86. The highlight of his innings was the 163-run partnership off just 57 balls with Naman Dhir (34 off 23), which shifted the momentum completely in India A’s favour.

title: 'Gamcha' in the air: PM Modi leads celebrations after NDA's sweeping victory in Bihar
content: The BJP-led NDA celebrated a significant victory in the Bihar Assembly elections, crossing the 200-seat mark. Prime Minister Narendra Modi made a triumphant entry at the Delhi BJP headquarters, greeted by enthusiastic party workers. The Mahagathbandhan faced a disappointing performance in the polls.

title: 14-year-old Vaibhav Suryavanshi shatters Rohit Sharma's long-standing record
content: Vaibhav Suryavanshi eventually finished with an extraordinary 144 off 42 balls, studded with 15 sixes and 11 fours, before falling in the 13th over. His assault powered India A to a massive 297/4 in their 20 overs, with captain Jitesh Sharma contributing a blistering 83 off 32 balls*.

title: Bihar polls: How Chirag Paswan emerged as man of the match with 1,800% gains, 70% strike rate
content: In a remarkable turn of events, Chirag Paswan's Lok Janshakti Party (Ram Vilas) emerged as a game changer in the Bihar assembly elections, enhancing the NDA's overall performance. With votes pouring in for the LJP (RV), they clinched or led in 19 vital constituencies, dispelling earlier doubts about the alliance's seat sharing.

title: 'Mahila-Youth': PM Modi says Bihar gave new M-Y formula, rejected appeasement politics
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi celebrated the NDA's historic win in Bihar, attributing the victory to the "Mahila and youth" and rejecting the opposition's "appeasement politics." Chief Minister Nitish Kumar thanked voters and PM Modi, emphasizing the NDA's unity and commitment to developing Bihar into a leading state.

title: ‘Few months were very different’: Indian student shares Ivy League experience
content: An Indian student at Cornell University, Harshvardhan Maskara, shares his journey navigating Ivy League academics and finances. He emphasizes early planning, understanding detailed course policies, and the significant cost of studying abroad, highlighting the importance of scholarships like the TATA Scholarship. Maskara's experience underscores the resilience and adaptability required for international students.

title: Bihar elections: How exit polls predicted outcome but missed the magnitude
content: Bihar's election results delivered a stunning landslide for the NDA, far exceeding exit poll predictions. While polls correctly anticipated an NDA victory, they drastically underestimated the scale of its triumph. This outcome echoes past elections, highlighting Bihar's unpredictable nature and raising questions about the accuracy of pre-election surveys.

title: Bihar results: From Magadh to Mithilanchal - NDA bowls out MGB across regions
content: The National Democratic Alliance is poised to retain power in Bihar with a significantly strengthened mandate, projected to win around 200 seats in the 243-member assembly. The BJP is leading in 91 seats and JD(U) in 79, outperforming rivals across all regions. The Mahagathbandhan secured only 37 seats, with RJD leading in 28.

title: 'Jassi bhai said.. ': Siraj reveals Bumrah's costly advice
content: India's pacers dominated the opening day against South Africa, bundling them out for 159. Mohammed Siraj highlighted the challenging pitch, noting variable bounce and the effectiveness of bowling stump-to-stump, especially with reverse swing. Jasprit Bumrah's five-wicket haul was crucial. India ended at 37/1, trailing by 122 runs, in a strong position.

title: Transfer rumors, news: Man United turn to Dortmund's Adeyemi
content: aubameyang: I wasn't happy at Manchester City anymore - but I was not happy at the club anymore . arsenal are pushing to get the 23-year-old to pen a new contract . Antoine Semenyo has two goals in 10 Bundesliga appearances .

content: the college football playoff committee will release its rankings each Tuesday through the end of the regular season . the final set of rankings will be released on Dec. 7 and those rankings will determine the final 12-team bracket . based on the CFP top 25 .

title: NWSL semifinals preview: Which recent champs will advance to the final?
content: the four most recent NWSL champions are also the 2025 semifinalists . Gotham defeated the no. 1-seeded Kansas City Current 2-1 in extra time . the Spirit, champions in 2021, lost last year's final to Orlando .

title: Last-minute pickups for Week 11: Joe Flacco, Devin Singletary among top options
content: this column will focus mostly on players rostered in fewer than 50% of ESPN leagues, with occasional exceptions . a volume thrower has put up big numbers over the past month, plus two signal-callers who provide rushing upside . there are a couple of pass-catching running backs in here as well .

title: Patriots', Rams' Rivalries uniforms top NFL Week 11 threads
content: the storm blue jerseys are matched with white pants and matte white helmets . the jerseys represent the six states that make up New England and the franchise's six Super Bowl wins . it's the first time the los Angeles Rams will wear "midnight navy"

title: NFL: Chiefs road favorites at Broncos, Seahawks slight 'dogs at Rams
content: the red-hot new England Patriots beat their division rival New York Jets on "Thursday Night Football" the Miami Dolphins are favored by 2.5 against the Washington Commanders in Madrid, Spain . the rest of the day features a plethora of marquee matchups, including the underdog Tampa Bay Buccaneers .

title: Area 51, an alien and the most fearsome young duo in the NBA
content: stepon CASTLE screamed, streaking down the floor with 8:28 left in the second quarter of the San Antonio Spurs . "RIM, VIC!" was a turning point in tv's season-opening win in Dallas . a whistle quickly pierced the noisy celebration as Dallas called a timeout to regroup .

title: 'Throwing lasers': Mason Heintschel came out of nowhere. Can he help Pitt win the ACC?
content: pat Narduzzi talks to pat McAfee about how Mason Heintschel has affected the team this season . he says he is an 18-year-old true freshman with five career college starts . "look at the urgency he has when he drops back," he adds .

title: Five players who are working out with their new teams -- and five who aren't
content: field Yates breaks down his top-10 ranking for Rico Dowdle against the Falcons in week 11 . he's ranked top-10 for the team through trades or free agency . which players have excelled in their new surroundings through 10 weeks .

title: TreVeyon Henderson helps power Patriots to best record in NFL after win over Jets
content: rookie running back TreVeyon Henderson fills in for injured starter Rhamondre Stevenson . the new England Patriots beat the new york Jets 27-14 on friday night . he is the third rookie in Patriots history with three touchouts .

title: Will the Dawgs do in the Horns? Can the Tide roll on? What you need to know for Week 12
content: most teams will lose another game . there's about a 1-in-3 chance that we end up with even a three-way tie of 7-1 teams atop the ACC . only one has greater than a 54% chance of winning out .

title: One self-taught team's plan to take down the greatest MMA lineage with 'no credentials'﻿
content: the head coach of Scrappy MMA in Perth, Australia, is one of the least-qualified trainers to be involved in a UFC title fight . the former lightweight champion is the only pound-for-pound fighter in the world . he is the first MMA fighter to retire undefeated, according to the online database .

title: Lions players tell their favorite Dan Campbell stories
content: first-year offensive coordinator was given the tall order of following previous coordinator Ben Johnson in the role . he helped turn the Lions into one of the NFL's top offenses over his three years in charge . the game marked the third straight contest in which Detroit had failed to score .

title: 🏀 NBA intel: Mavs' spiral, early-season trends
content: there weren't many people believing GM Nico Harrison should have remained as Mavs general manager . we decided to ask league executives and scouts if they're believing in some of the most impactful early-season trends across the NBA . the crater that is the Mavericks franchise before moving on to hot starts for the lakers .

title: Don't be surprised if ... Randle leads Timberwolves in fantasy points
content: if any of these thoughts come true, don't be surprised . he is off to a fantastic start, averaging 25.4 PPG, 7.2 RPG and 6.2 APG through 11 games . his numbers fell in most categories and he finished outside the top 50 in fantasy scoring .

title: The Playbook: Lineup locks, Shadow Reports for Week 11
content: this column features score projections, over/unders, win probabilities, and, of course, easy digestible fantasy advice for seasonlong leagues and DFS . the weekly Shadow Reports: WR vs. CB Cheat Shutter explains why he is hesitant to start Jameson Williams in fantasy .

title: Cancer to comics — Bengal researcher makes art out of science
content: This boy from Liluah near Howrah resident, joined the Bose Institute in Kolkata in 2009 as a research scholar on cancer biology, but dropped out of the programme in 2015 without accepting a degree.

title: CM Stalin inaugurates modernised library with co-working hub
content: The renovated facility in Mr. Stalin’s Kolathur constituency includes air-conditioned library halls, training rooms, and e-learning facilities

title: Delhi car blast: Doctors with bombs
content: On the evening of November 10, an explosion in a car near the Red Fort in Delhi killed 13 people and injured at least 20. Investigations suggest that the suspect, Dr. Umar ul Nabi, who died in the blast, was part of a network that was allegedly plotting terror strikes. Nine people, some of them doctors, have been arrested. Vijaita Singh and Alisha Dutta report on the tragedy in the national capital and the findings of the investigation

title: Mahayuti hails NDA’s win in Bihar as historic while Opposition alleges foul play
content: Nitish Kumar-led NDA scored a historic Bihar victory, drawing praise from allies even as Congress and Shiv Sena (UBT) alleged irregularities and a BJP-driven “national agenda.”

title: West Bengal BJP enthused with Bihar victory says party’s victory in State evident in 2026
content: Trinamool Congress leadership said that West Bengal and Bihar are not the same and Mamata Banerjee will return to power for the fourth time in 2026 Assembly polls.

title: Massive explosion inside J&K police station leaves 8 injured
content: A joint team of J&K Police and Forensic Science Laboratory was surveying explosives, including ammonium nitrate, confiscated during the recent raids in Haryana’s Faridabad at the time of the blast, initial reports suggest

title: Licences of doctors accused in Delhi car blast revoked
content: The National Medical Commission said the conduct of the doctors was prima facie “inconsistent with the standards of ethical propriety, integrity and public trust” expected of members of the medical profession

title: ‘Surprise’ over two candidates remains as Cong. presents rest of its panel for Kochi Corporation
content: The party has already announced candidates for 62 of the 76 divisions in the Corpn. through two separate lists; first list contained 40 names, followed by another list of 22 candidates on November 13, 2025

title: Keen to get back to active politics: Partha Chatterjee
content: Ahead of the 2026 Assembly elections, political reconciliations are on the cards as former Kolkata Mayor Sovan Chattopadhyay made a comeback after 7 years

title: Ironic that climate sensitive coffee is not covered under  climate-linked insurance, says KPA president
content: The absence of a weather-linked insurance policy for coffee places growers in India in an extremely vulnerable position, said Arvind Rao, president, Karnataka Planters’ Association

title: Supreme Court to examine plea seeking hospital patient care allowance to PwDs
content: Court admits petition filed against Health Ministry’s notification stopping allowance to workers with disabilities in healthcare establishments; plea says persons with disabilities working in hospitals ‘are already a vulnerable class’

title: Vellore police seize 130 kg gutkha; three held
content: The consignment was headed to industrial towns like Sriperumbudur and Oragadam in Kancheepuram where the banned product was to be sold to retail dealers.

title: Inquiry report in Sivapriya’s death rules out hospital-acquired infection
content: Sivapriya, who had a normal delivery on October 22 at SAT hospital, was discharged on October 24 and had been re-admitted with high fever, diarrhoea and in a state of septic shock on October 26th evening. Her death following sepsis on November 5 triggered allegation that the infection was hospital-acquired

title: Centre stalling Karnataka’s irrigation projects by not giving clearances despite favourable judgments: DKS
content: Siddaramaiah and Shivakumar accuse BJP and JD (S) MPs of not speaking up for the cause of Karnataka in irrigation matters

title: Woman washed away in Palar river near Katpadi
content: Two women were admitted at Government Medical College Hospital in Vellore town where doctors said that Geetha was brought dead whereas Poornima is undergoing treatment

title: Jaishankar to meet Russian counterpart in Moscow on November 17
content: Russian Foreign Ministry spokesperson Maria Zakharova said the Indian External Affairs Minister will arrive in Moscow with an official delegation for the Shanghai Cooperation Organisation Heads of State Council meeting, to held on November 17-18.

title: Two persons electrocuted in illegal electrical fence near Chengam; two farmers held
content: Bodies of the duo were found in a farmwell near the forest area by police after family members of them complained that they did not return home after long hours.

title: Bengaluru Safe City Project helps in detection of inter-State crimes
content: The state-of-the-art Artificial Intelligence systems, installed under the Bengaluru Safe City Project, have become silent, yet powerful tools for law enforcement agencies across multiple States

title: Shameful that AIADMK is supporting SIR in Supreme Court: Stalin
content: He calls upon his party’s booth agents to ensure that not even a single genuine voter will be excluded from the voter rolls during the course of the SIR

title: Tej Pratap Yadav, key Congress leaders among major losers in Bihar Assembly election
content: Shock defeats for Tej Pratap Yadav, Congress leadership and several prominent candidates in Bihar election results

title: Modi, BJP, RSS have made it an occupation to criticise Gandhiji and Nehru: Siddaramaiah
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi, the Bharatiya Janata Party, and the Rashtriya Swayamsevak Sangh have made it their occupation to criticise the first Prime of India Jawaharlal Nehru and Mahatma Gandhi, and make unfounded allegations against them, Chief Minister Siddaramaiah has said

title: NDA takes Bihar by storm
content: Ruling alliance surges ahead in 202 seats in the 243-member Assembly; BJP emerges as single largest party winning 89 seats; Mahagatbandhan faces crushing defeat, winning only 33 seats

title: State hasn’t transferred murder investigation records to CBI, Armstrong’s wife alleges in SC
content: On October 10, the apex court had stayed a Madras High Court to quash the chargesheet in the case. It, however, had not intervened with the High Court’s direction to transfer the investigation to the CBI

title: J&K L-G administration suspends police officer accused of thrashing senior official in Jammu
content: In a rare move, officers of the Jammu and Kashmir Administrative Service had threatened ‘mass casual leave in protest against the alleged assault and harassment of the officer’

title: AIM@IISc releases dataset and advanced vision models for Indian urban traffic
content: UVH-26 contains 26,646 high-resolution traffic images sourced from Bengaluru’s Safe City project and features 1.8 million bounding-box annotations across 14 India-specific vehicle classes, including two-wheelers, auto-rickshaws, light commercial vehicles, and buses

title: Bihar election results 2025: 5 reasons behind NDA's historic win
content: the BJP is set to secure a whopping 203 seats in the 243-seat assembly . the 2025 polls unfolded against the backdrop of a meticulously crafted campaign focused on stability, development, and inclusivity .

title: Bihar Assembly elections 2025: BJP quelled discontent to ensure vote transfer among NDA allies
content: The party micromanaged all allies and kept them on the same page, making sure votes were not split; meetings were held between workers of JD(U) and LJP (RV) to iron out differences

title: Assembly bypolls: Congress, BJP bag two seats each; NC loses stronghold
content: PDP wrests Budgam from NC; BJP wins big in Odisha’s Nuapada; Congress bags one seat each in Rajasthan and Telangana; MNF, AAP and JMM retain Dampa, Tarn Taran and Ghatshila respectively

title: IIT Madras launches ‘Language and Cognition Lab’ to study India’s linguistic diversity
content: In the long term, it aims to contribute to the development of human-centred and linguistically aware AI systems, ensuring that India’s languages and cultures are represented in emerging technologies

title: Congress blames SIR, ‘vote chori’ after worst performance in Bihar since 2010
content: “We could not achieve victory in an election that was not fair from the very beginning,” says LoP Rahul Gandhi; former Rajasthan CM asks why ECI let the Bihar government continue cash transfers while the MCC was in force

title: This is the right time to invest in India and Andhra Pradesh, says Vice-President C.P. Radhakrishnan
content: India is emerging as an economic powerhouse under the leadership of Prime Minister Narendra Modi, and the Central and State governments are working together for the development of the country and Andhra Pradesh, he says

title: V. Sekar, master of 90s family dramas, dies
content: Sekar was well-known for capturing the mundane lives of working classes and middle-income group families

title: ONGC seeks locals’ support to repair gutted pipeline
content: Kakinada Collector assures talks with ONGC for compensation for fisherfolk affected by the accident in Yanam and Kakinada districts.

title: Karayi Chandrasekharan to contest in Thalassery civic polls amid pending murder case
content: The CPI(M) is aiming to bring him back as the chairperson if the party retains its hold in the Thalassery municipality

title: Internal conflict, fight over CM post, delayed campaign take a toll on INDIA
content: During the entire campaign of the RJD and Congress, attack on Special Intensive Revision (SIR) and vote chori (vote theft) was the central theme which did not work on the ground

title: CPI’s Kochi Deputy Mayor resigns from party, slams candidate selection process
content: Kochi mandalam committee issues statement dismissing Ansiya’s allegations as baseless and adds list of candidates was finalised  based on majority decision of the committee, which was then forwarded to the district committee, that approved the candidacy

title: Telangana mulls pension scheme for all employees with PFRDA support: official
content: With India’s large population and its demographic dividend, he said that the need is to prepare for the ageing population that is projected to rise by 10% in the next decade, the official noted

title: Bihar election results: A women-powered victory for Nitish Kumar
content: Nitish Kumar, who was widely considered to be on the brink of political irrelevance, achieved his second-best electoral result in 2025. This resurgence was fuelled by the success of the Mukhyamantri Mahila Rozgar Yojana, a policy formulated precisely when speculation was rife about whether he would retain the Chief Minister’s chair

title: Sugarcane farmers end strike in Mudhol after Minister, leaders hold talks
content: The protesting growers settle for the government-fixed price of ₹3,300 per tonne of produce to be supplied to factories

title: Naidu links Bihar mandate to demand for development, stresses reforms at finance summit
content: At the Reimagining Public Finance Summit in Visakhapatnam on Friday, the Chief Minister says the NDA’s Bihar victory reflects people’s aspiration for development and welfare, and highlighted reforms, incentives and his Swarna Andhra 2047 vision

title: Indian military heritage festival 2025 begins; Minister stresses need to preserve military legacy
content: Minister of State for Defence Sanjay Seth says understanding India’s military history is not just a matter of pride but a way to build a stronger foundation for self-reliance and national security

title: MoUs worth more than ₹11 lakh crore reached at CII Partnership Summit in Visakhapatnam
content: Among them are an agreement by the Reliance Industries Limited to set up a 1-Gigawatt AI Data Centre and a 6 GWp solar power project to power it, and build a greenfield integrated food park in Rayalaseema region

title: Rabi water release schedule for Tungabhadra canals announced
content: Deputy Chief Minister D.K. Shivakumar, who holds the Water Resources portfolio, chairs meeting to review water availability in the reservoir

title: NHAI orders urgent safety audit of Aroor-Thuravoor elevated NH corridor project
content: A pickup driver was killed when the girder fell on his vehicle on the Aroor-Thuravoor elevated highway in Alappuzha

title: Three-day bird festival begins in Wayanad
content: Hundreds flocked to the first-ever experiential bird festival, ‘Haekki Benakku’, which began at the Hume Centre for Ecology and Wildlife Biology at Puliyarmala near Kalpetta

title: Karnataka High Court directs State government to give status report on implementation of Rights of Persons with Disabilities Act
content: The High Court of Karnataka on Friday directed the State government to file a status report on the implementation of various important provisions of the Rights of Persons with Disabilities Act, 2016, on a PIL petition, which has complained about Karnataka’s ‘persistent and unjustifiable delay’ in implementing the mandate of this law meant for welfare of persons with disabilities.

title: Delhi HC seeks Centre’s reply on Ashok Swain blacklisting plea
content: Academic challenges alleged blacklisting order barring his India entry; court asks Centre to file response in three weeks

title: Bihar 2025 results: Congress leads in one seat along Voter Adhikar Yatra route, RJD and Left in none
content: In the 31 seats along the Yatra route , the RJD had fielded 14 candidates, the Congress 16 candidates

title: CJI to deal with bid to 'influence NCLAT judge by member of judiciary'
content: a "revered member of the higher judiciary" is accused of trying to influence a judicial member of a national company law Appellate Tribunal in Chennai . he said the matter will be dealt with appropriately on the administrative side by CJI B R Gavai . "i will take an appropriate decision soon," he says .

title: Bihar election results: Single-digit show may spell double trouble for Congress
content: abysmal show threatens to trap the party in the rut that it has been trying to climb out of since 2014 . this setback will only harden the belief among party functionaries that the future remains bleak, a concern that had triggered an exodus of popular faces between 2014 and 2023 .

title: Bihar election results: The 'silent' gamechangers — how women powered NDA’s big win
content: two headline-grabbing outcomes have captured the spotlight . a sweeping victory for the national Democratic Alliance (NDA) and a record voter turnout unseen in more than seventy years . the historic rise in turnout among Bihar’s women voters shattered turnout records .

title: Friendly fights, Lalu's shadow: 5 reasons behind MGB's stunning loss
content: The TOI News Desk comprises a dedicated and tireless team of journalists who operate around the clock to deliver the most current and comprehensive news and updates to the readers of The Times of India worldwide. With an unwavering commitment to excellence in journalism, our team is at the forefront of gathering, verifying, and presenting breaking news, in-depth analysis, and insightful reports on a wide range of topics. The TOI News Desk is your trusted source for staying informed and connected to the ever-evolving global landscape, ensuring that our readers are equipped with the latest developments that matter most." Read More

title: Rebel MAGA lawmaker proposes bill to end H-1B visas as jobs crisis rattles Americans
content: the bill would eliminate the H-1B visa program, stripping its pathway to citizenship and forcing visa holders to return home upon expiration . the proposal targets big tech, AI firms, hospitals, and other industries accused of abusing the system to undercut US “talent” with “cheaper” foreign labor .

title: First arrests made in spate of attacks targeting Indians in Ireland
content: a male in his 30s and a juvenile teen were arrested for the brutal attack on the Indian Amazon employee in Tallaght, Dublin, on July 19 . a highly-skilled Indian national, aged in his 40s, was stripped naked, stabbed and left almost for dead by a gang near a roundabout . his 11-month-old baby and wife were still in India .

title: Bihar elections: RJD may be down to 0 in Rajya Sabha by 2030
content: Vishwa Mohan is Senior Editor at The Times of India. He writes on environment, climate change, agriculture, water resources and clean energy, tracking policy issues and climate diplomacy. He has been covering Parliament since 2003 to see how politics shaped up domestic policy and India’s position at global platform. Before switching over to explore sustainable development issues, Vishwa had covered internal security and investigative agencies for more than a decade. Read More

title: Bihar election results: PM Modi hails 'sushasan ki jeet'; hints at Nitish staying CM
content:
NEW DELHI: PM Modi termed NDA's landslide performance as "sushasan ki jeet (victory of good governance)", in what was seen as an endorsement of the continuation of Nitish Kumar as CM. Nitish is popular among his followers as "Sushasan Babu", claiming to have effected a turnaround in the past 20 years by improving law and order, and development. "Victory of development has been achieved. Victory of the spirit of public welfare has been achieved. Victory of social justice has been achieved," Modi posted on X.

‘Bihar’s New MY Formula Is Mahila & Youth’: PM Modi Targets RJD-Congress After NDA’s Landslide Win

"I congratulate all NDA leaders for their wonderful work and CM Nitish Kumar for his leadership," Modi said, allaying apprehensions about Nitish's continuation as CM even as BJP emerged as the single largest party. The opposition had claimed that BJP would not reappoint Nitish as CM. Also read: With promises & warnings, Shah turned around 'aggrieved souls'

End of Article

title: Bihar elections: How Mahila ink scripted NDA's story — and Nitish struck right notes
content: 71.6% of women turned up to vote this time - up from 59.7% in 2020 . a 'no' to MGB's return bid is seen as an endorsement of NDA govt . an entire generation of women has benefitted from welfare programmes .

title: Delhi car blast: Forces demolish bomber Umar Nabi's J&K home with explosives
content: security forces triggered three controlled explosions to raze the family home of 'suicide bomber' Dr Umar un-Nabi's home . the plan involved evacuating his kin and residents of nearby houses before using explosives . a dozen houses in the vicinity suffered some damage, residents alleged .
